content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

1->2->3->4->7

This is the shortest path from node 5 (start point) to node 6 (target point) in the given graph. Note that this path involves going through node 2, 3, and 4 before reaching the target node 7.

1->2->4

This is the shortest path from node 6 (start point) to node 5 (target point) in the given graph. Note that this path involves going through node 2 and 4 before reaching the target node 5.
